documentation.text:
@dev Allows the admin to approve a pending claim.
 @param _claimId The ID of the claim to approve.

@dev Allows the admin to reject a pending claim.
 @param _claimId The ID of the claim to reject.

approveClaim(uint256).details: Allows the admin to approve a pending claim.

params._claimId: The ID of the claim to approve.

rejectClaim(uint256).details: Allows the admin to reject a pending claim.

params._claimId: The ID of the claim to reject.

submitClaim(uint256,string,uint256).details: Allows a policyholder to submit a claim against their active policy.

params._amount: The amount being claimed, in Wei.
params._policyId: The ID of the policy being claimed against.
